summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permission granted to Group Health Cooperative of Puget Sound, by Ordinance 102519, as amended by Ordinance 113876, to construct, maintain and operate a tunnel for pedestrian and hospital purposes under and across East Thomas Street, east of Fifteenth Avenue East; by amending Section 12 thereof to update insurance requirements; and establishing the annual fee for the next five (5) years of the permit.
